data.text: @RepSaraJacobs @BekkersSanDiego Yesterday the Russians dropped a bomb on a maternity and children's hospital in Mariupol #ukraine, and this is not the first crime against humanity. They killed 70!!!!! children. Please close the sky or give us fighter jets, anti-rocket, anti-aircraft defence #CloseTheSky

@RepSaraJacobs @BekkersSanDiego 🙏 The Russian occupiers are killing civilians every day. Help us to stop Putin! Millions of peopleâ€™s lives depend on you 🇺🇦.  #SafeAirliftUkraine  #NoFlyZone  #StandWithUkraine #CloseTheSky

@RepSaraJacobs @BekkersSanDiego 28 years ago Ukraine gave up its nuclear weapons for security guarantees under the Budapest memorandum Russia has violated these and every day bombards our cities and kills innocent civilians including children Save our lives by closing the sky over Ukraine! #StopTheWarInUkraine

@RepSaraJacobs @BekkersSanDiego Save our lives by closing the sky over Ukraine! Help us protect ourselves by providing airplanes! Every day Russia bombards civilians including children.  If freedom, independence and lives of innocent people are of any value to you please help us close the sky over Ukraine.

@RepSaraJacobs @BekkersSanDiego Today, March 9, the Russians launched an air strike on the children's hospital and maternity hospital.
28 years ago Ukraine gave up its nuclear weapons for security guarantees under the Budapest memorandum. Help us protect ourselves by providing airplanes. Thanks for support!

@RepSaraJacobs @BekkersSanDiego Russia's war against Ukraine has been going on for 14 days, killing more than 2,500 civilians. Russia commits genocide against Ukrainians. Save our lives by closing the sky over Ukraine!
Help us protect ourselves by providing aircraft! https://t.co/c4Yf2xe178
@RepSaraJacobs Thank you for the meals. They were yummy. Thanks for the Support!
